item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hello, I am trying to make this code that if you have 20 construction, you get to make the object, but if you have less than 20, it wouldnâ€™t work. This code gives me 100 errors, I cant get the brackets to match

heres the code:

if(q6 == 15){ if (playerHasItem(960, 2)) { if (playerLevel[21] >= 20) { deleteItem(960, 1); deleteItem(960, 1); setAnimation(898); makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2213, 1, 10); resetAnimation(); addSkillXP(500, 21); } else { sM("You don't have 2 planks to make a Bank Booth"); } else { sM("You Need Level 20 Construction To Make A Bank Booth:); } } }

plesse help me, ill rep+
